Articles.Content: Ok, so i just downloaded KSP off of the site for free... i think... is this the demo version or the full version just as everyone else? Also, how do you open that oribt menu option? ive seen it on videos but i cant see how to figure it out. please respond thank you. OH and can u have a space station up in space then start a new flight in the demo or no?
There is a Wiki for a reason.

You\'re in the demo.

You have to donate 15 USD to get the current version (.15.2)

And I believe you\'re looking for a plugin called 'MechJeb', which isn\'t compatible with the demo version. BUT, there are plenty of mods that do.

If it says 'Plugin' or '.15+' it won\'t work.

OH and can u have a space station up in space then start a new flight in the demo or no?

Sorry, nope. Persistence ( the ability to have multiple flights simultaneously) was added in .14, while the demo version is .13.3
this should be in the support forums
